segments.text: Do you mind if we talk about your schedule tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be best . I'd like to have a good rest first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And this is the schedule for Mrs . Watson . Eileen from our department will take care of her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Shall we discuss the schedule in the lobby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll see you in the lobby tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1
